com.raiden.game.physics_controller

Class Physics_Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.raiden.game.physics_controller.Physics_Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.ContactListener

    public class Physics_Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.ContactListener
    Controlls the physics Aspects of the PVE Game

      • verifyBounds

        public boolean verifyBounds(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body body,
                            boolean delete)
        Verifies if the body is inside the viewport and arena bounds
        Parameters:
        body - The body to be verified.
        delete - True if this body should be deleted when it crosses the y bounds, false otherwise;
        Returns:
        true if body should be deleted, 0 otherwise
